FILTER(?author != ?otherAuthor) } GROUP BY ?authorCount }

sparql_query_kg2: prefix oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> prefix dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (SUM(?count) AS ?total_count) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3560-4288" . BIND(COUNT(DISTINCT ?y) AS ?count) FILTER(?count > 1) } } GROUP BY ?total_count

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by P. R. S. Mendon\u00E7a?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4025-4083" . OPTIONAL { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship2 . ?authorship2 oa:hasAuthor ?author2 } ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author3 . FILTER(?author2 != ?author3) BIND(COUNT(DISTINCT ?author) AS ?count) } GROUP BY ?author

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for research papers published by Gustaf S\u00F6derlind?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X" . ?work oa:hasLocation ?location . ?location oa:hasSource ?venue . ?work fabio:hasCreator ?creator . FILTER (?creator != ?author) BIND (COUNT(DISTINCT ?creator) AS ?count) }

natural_language_question: List the titles of the papers that Nikolay M. Safyannikov published and in which venues.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT DISTINCT ?venue ?title WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5424-0881" . ?work oa:hasLocation ?location . ?location oa:hasSource ?venue . ?work dct:title ?title . }

natural_language_question: Which papers did author Gerard J. M. Janssen publish and in which year?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT DISTINCT ?work ?year WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5423-4468" . ?work fabio:hasPublicationYear ?year . }
